description: This movement intensive class is a blend of the art and the science of the body in
dancing. It integrates an artistic approach to moving with a physical experience that
deepens awareness of the body in motion and enhances understanding of body structure and
function.This class also links to the content and focus in DANCE 201 and DANCE 301.
Offered each semester. Counts toward neuroscience concentration. Prerequisite: DANCE 111 or DANCE
